title: Patient-Reported Outcome Measures in Individuals With Hereditary or Sporadic Kidney Cancer

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: 67% patient adherence to PRO assessments improved trial retention by 40%.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Integrate AI-driven reminders for optimal completion timing.
